about_the_game:
The warrior elven Xyrra must get to the mountains to free her sister, who has been kidnapped and imprisoned in the dungeon.
She is held by a bloodthirsty demon who manages a horde of evil creatures.
Complete levels, collect artifacts, defeat the Demon and free your sister.




Classic 2D arcade platform game. Sword fight with monsters and the final fight with the Evil Demon.
There are 3 stages, each in a different world / scenery. Explore forest, mountains and lava world.



Hunt down the beasts and search for lost treasures.
at the beginning you will see an epic intro which will introduce you to the mystery world of Mythica.



Key features:

  • Collect Unique Cards
  • Collect Elven tokens as Many as Possible
  • Defeat Your Enemies With Swords and Magic
  • Show your dexterity and overcome various levels
